sense.def:
A hole
je odprtina ali prazen prostor v nečem trdnem.

seg.quote: What do you recommend for filling holes and cracks?
He was wearing grey socks with holes in them.

sense.def:
To pick holes in an argument or theory
pomeni najti šibke točke v neki trditvi ali teoriji;

seg.quote: Why don't you leave this awful hole and come to live with me?

sense.def:
Kadar neka stavba ali ladja
is holed
, vanjo naredijo luknje.

seg.quote: The buildings were holed by shrapnel.
